titleStmt.title: Two sermons: preached by that faithfull and reverend divine, Richard Sibbes, D.D. and sometimes preacher to the honorable society of Grayes Inne; and master of Katherine Hall in Cambridge
titleStmt.author: Sibbes, Richard, 1577-1635.

publicationStmt.publisher: By T. Cotes, for Andr. Kembe, & are to be sold at his Shop at S. Margarits Hall in Southwarke,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
